name: CW_ABST_ANEMIA_MINERAL
description: Anemia management and mineral metabolism information from abstractions with clinical information reported to the United States ESRD patient registry.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the registry data record.

columns.name: HEMOGLOBIN_LAB_VALUE
columns.description: The dialysis patient's hemoglobin lab value.

columns.name: HEMOGLOBIN_LAB_DATE
columns.description: The hemoglobin lab collection date of a dialysis patient.

columns.name: TSAT_LAB_VALUE
columns.description: The iron saturation percentage value of a dialysis patient.

columns.name: TSAT_LAB_DATE
columns.description: The iron saturation lab collection date of a dialysis patient.

columns.name: RETICULOCYTE_HGB_LAB_VALUE
columns.description: The reticulocyte hemoglobin lab value of a dialysis patient.

columns.name: RETICULOCYTE_HGB_LAB_DATE
columns.description: The reticulocyte hemoglobin lab collection date of a dialysis patient.

columns.name: FERRITIN_LAB_VALUE
columns.description: The serum ferritin lab value of a dialysis patient.

columns.name: FERRITIN_LAB_DATE
columns.description: The serum ferritin lab collection date of a dialysis patient.

columns.name: ESA_IS_ADMIN_YN
columns.description: Shows whether dialysis Erythropoiesis Stimulating Agent is administered or not.

columns.name: ESA_ADMIN_DATE
columns.description: The dialysis patient's Erythropoiesis Stimulating Agent administration date.

columns.name: ESA_MONTHLY_DOSE
columns.description: The dialysis patient's Erythropoiesis Stimulating Agent monthly dose value.

columns.name: ESA_DOSE_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description: The dialysis patient's Erythropoiesis Stimulating Agent monthly dose unit.

columns.name: ESA_AGENT_C_NAME
columns.description: The Erythropoiesis Stimulating Agent information that is prescribed to dialysis patient.

columns.name: ESA_ROUTE_C_NAME
columns.description: The dialysis patient's Erythropoiesis Stimulating Agent route information.

columns.name: ESA_OTHER_AGENT
columns.description: The name of the dialysis patient's Erythropoiesis Stimulating Agent if it is not in the list of common agents.

columns.name: ESA_OTHER_DOSE
columns.description: The dialysis patient's Erythropoiesis Stimulating Agent monthly dose unit if it is not in the list of common units.

columns.name: IV_IRON_IS_ADMIN_YN
columns.description: Shows whether dialysis IV iron is administered or not.

columns.name: IV_IRON_ADMIN_DATE
columns.description: The dialysis patient's IV iron administration date.

columns.name: IV_IRON_AGENT_C_NAME
columns.description: The IV iron name that is administered to a dialysis patient

columns.name: IV_IRON_OTHER_AGENT
columns.description: The name of the dialysis patient's administered IV iron if it is not in the list of common agents.

columns.name: IV_IRON_MONTHLY_DOSE
columns.description: The dialysis patient's IV iron dose.

columns.name: IV_IRON_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description: The dialysis patient's IV iron dose unit.

columns.name: IV_IRON_OTHER_UNIT
columns.description: The dialysis patient's IV iron dose unit if it is not in the list of common units.

columns.name: ORAL_IRON_IS_PRESC_YN
columns.description: Shows whether dialysis oral iron is prescribed or not.

columns.name: ORAL_IRON_PRESC_DATE
columns.description: The dialysis patient's oral iron prescription date.

columns.name: ORAL_IRON_AGENT_C_NAME
columns.description: The dialysis patient's oral iron agent.

columns.name: ORAL_IRON_OTHER_AGENT
columns.description: The dialysis patient's oral iron agent if it is not in the common agents list.

columns.name: ORAL_IRON_MONTHLY_DOSE
columns.description: The dialysis patient's oral iron dose value.

columns.name: ORAL_IRON_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description: The dialysis patient's oral iron dose unit.

columns.name: ORAL_IRON_OTHER_UNIT
columns.description: The dialysis patient's oral iron dose unit if it is not in the list of common units.

columns.name: CORRECTED_CALCIUM_LAB_VALUE
columns.description: The dialysis patient's corrected serum calcium lab value.

columns.name: CORRECTED_CALCIUM_LAB_DATE
columns.description: The dialysis patient's corrected serum calcium lab collection date.

columns.name: ALBUMIN_LAB_VALUE
columns.description: The dialysis patient's serum albumin lab value.

columns.name: ALBUMIN_LAB_DATE
columns.description: The dialysis patient's serum albumin lab collection date.

columns.name: ALBUMIN_LAB_METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description: The method used to perform the dialysis patient's serum albumin lab test.

columns.name: ALBUMIN_LAB_LOWER_LIMIT
columns.description: The lower limit of the dialysis patient's serum albumin lab test.

columns.name: PHOSPHORUS_LAB_VALUE
columns.description: The dialysis patient's serum phosphorus lab value.

columns.name: PHOSPHORUS_LAB_DATE
columns.description: The dialysis patient's serum phosphorus lab collection date.

columns.name: PHOSPHORUS_LAB_METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description: The dialysis patient's serum phosphorus lab method.

columns.name: UNCORRECTED_CALCIUM_LAB_VALUE
columns.description: The dialysis patient's uncorrected serum calcium lab value.

columns.name: UNCORRECTED_CALCIUM_LAB_DATE
columns.description: The dialysis patient's uncorrected serum calcium lab collection date.

columns.name: PTH_LAB_VALUE
columns.description: The dialysis patient's parathyroid hormone lab value.

columns.name: PTH_LAB_DATE
columns.description: The dialysis patient's parathyroid hormone lab collection date.

columns.name: PTH_LAB_METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description: The dialysis patient's parathyroid hormone lab method.

columns.name: PTH_LAB_UPPER_LIMIT
columns.description: The upper limit of the dialysis patient's parathyroid hormone lab test.
